languages.text: Этот мир могла постигнуть участь куда страшнее — сожжение было актом милосердия.

traits.locale_text: Этот мир могла постигнуть участь куда страшнее — сожжение было актом милосердия.

languages.text: This world could have suffered a much worse fate — its cleansing was an act of mercy.
languages.original_text: Этот мир могла постигнуть участь куда страшнее — сожжение было актом милосердия.

traits.locale_text: This world could have suffered a much worse fate — the burning was an act of mercy.
This world could have suffered a much worse fate — the burning was an act of mercy.
This world could have suffered a much worse fate — its cleansing was an act of mercy.
This world could have suffered a much worse fate — its cleansing was an act of mercy.
This world could have suffered a much worse fate — its cleansing was an act of mercy.

languages.text: 这个世界本可能会遭受更加可怕的命运，净化它是仁慈之举。
languages.original_text: This world could have suffered a much worse fate — its cleansing was an act of mercy.

traits.locale_text: 这个世界本可能会遭受更加可怕的命运，净化它是仁慈之举。

languages.text: この世界はもっと悲惨な運命をたどる可能性があった…その浄めは慈悲の行為だった。
languages.original_text: This world could have suffered a much worse fate — its cleansing was an act of mercy.

traits.locale_text: この世界はもっと悲惨な運命をたどる可能性があった…その浄めは慈悲の行為だった。

languages.text: Este mundo podría haber tenido un destino mucho peor. Su purga ha sido un acto de misericordia.
languages.original_text: This world could have suffered a much worse fate — its cleansing was an act of mercy.

traits.locale_text: Este mundo podría haber tenido un destino mucho peor. Su purga ha sido un acto de misericordia.

languages.text: Diese Welt hätte ein viel schlimmeres Schicksal erleiden können. Die Säuberung war ein Akt der Gnade.
languages.original_text: This world could have suffered a much worse fate — its cleansing was an act of mercy.

traits.locale_text: Diese Welt hätte ein viel schlimmeres Schicksal erleiden können. Die Säuberung war ein Akt der Gnade.

languages.text: Ce monde aurait pu connaître un sort bien pire, sa purification était un acte de miséricorde.
languages.original_text: This world could have suffered a much worse fate — its cleansing was an act of mercy.

traits.locale_text: Ce monde aurait pu connaître un sort bien pire, sa purification était un acte de miséricorde.

languages.text: Bu dünya, çok daha kötü bir kadere mahkûm olabilirdi. Arındırılması, merhamet olarak görülmelidir.
languages.original_text: This world could have suffered a much worse fate — its cleansing was an act of mercy.
